name: Daryabadi
text: Alif. Lam. Ra. These are the verses of the Book, and a Qur'an luminous.

name: Daryabadi
text: Oft times would those who disbelieve fain that they had been Muslims.

name: Daryabadi
text: Leave them thou to eat and to enjoy, and let vain hope divert them; presently they will know.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We have not destroyed a town but there was therefor a decree known.

name: Daryabadi
text: No community precedeth the term thereof nor doth it fall behind.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they say: O thou unto whom the Admonition hath been sent down! verily thou art possessed.

name: Daryabadi
text: Why bringest thou not angels unto us if thou art of the truthtellers!

name: Daryabadi
text: We send not the angels down save with judgment, and then they would not be respited.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily We! it is We who have revealed the Admonition, and verily We are the guardians thereof.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly We have sent apostles before thee among the sects of the ancients.

name: Daryabadi
text: And not an apostle came unto them but at him they were wont to mock.

name: Daryabadi
text: Even so we make a way for it in the hearts of the culprits.

name: Daryabadi
text: They believe not therein, and already the example of the ancients hath gone forth.

name: Daryabadi
text: And if We opened upon them a door of the heaven, and they passed the day mounting thereto.

name: Daryabadi
text: They would surely say: intoxicated have been our sights; aye! we are a people enchanted.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly We have set constellations in the heaven and made it fairseeming unto the beholders

name: Daryabadi
text: And We have guarded it from every Satan damned.

name: Daryabadi
text: Save him who stealeth the hearing, and him there followeth a flame gleaming.

name: Daryabadi
text: And the earth! We have stretched it out and have cast thereon mountains firm, and We have caused to spring up thereon everything weighed.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We have appointed thereon for you livelihoods and also for those of whom ye are not the providers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And there is not of aught but with Us are the treasures thereof, and We send it not down save in a measure known

name: Daryabadi
text: And We send the winds fertilizing, then We send down water from the heaven and We give it to you to drink, and thereof ye could not be the treasurers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily We! it is We who give life and death, and We shall be the survivors.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly We know those of you who have gone before and those who will come hereafter.

name: Daryabadi
text: And veriiy thy Lord! He will gather them, and verily He is Wise. Knowing.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly We have created human being from ringing clay of loam moulded.

name: Daryabadi
text: And the Jinn, We had created them afore of the fire of the scroching wind.

name: Daryabadi
text: And recall what time thy Lord said unto the angels: verily I am about to createa man from ringing clay of loam moulded.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then when I have formed him and breathed into him of My Spirit fall down unto him prostrate.

name: Daryabadi
text: So the angels prostrated themselves, all of them together.

name: Daryabadi
text: But Iblis did not; he refused to be with the prostrates.

name: Daryabadi
text: Allah said: O Iblis! what aileth thou that thou art not with the prostrates?

name: Daryabadi
text: He said it was not for me that should prostrate myself unto a human being whom Thou hast created from ringing clay of loam moulded.

name: Daryabadi
text: Allah said: then get thee forth therefrom; verily thou art one damned.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily on thee shall be the curse till the Day of Requital.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: my Lord! respite me then till the Day whereon they will be raised up.

name: Daryabadi
text: Allah said: verily then thou art of the respited:

name: Daryabadi
text: Till the Day of the Time known.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: my Lord! because Thou hast led me to err I will surely make things fairseeming unto them on the earth and will surely seduce them all:

name: Daryabadi
text: But not such of them as are Thy bondmen single-hearted.

name: Daryabadi
text: Allah said: this is the path leeding unto Me straight.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily as for My bondmen, no authority shalt thou have over them, except the erring one who follow thee.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily Hell is the place promised unto them all.

name: Daryabadi
text: Unto it are seven portals; unto each portal is a Portion of them assigned.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily the God-fearing shall be amidst gardens and springs.

name: Daryabadi
text: Enter therein in peace, secure.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We shall have removed whatsoever of grudge may be in their breasts: brethren they. sitting upon couches facing each other.

name: Daryabadi
text: There shall touch them no toil therein, nor therefrom they shall ever be driven out.

name: Daryabadi
text: Declare thou unto My bondmen: verily I! I am the Forgiver, the Merciful.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily My torment! that is the torment afflictive

name: Daryabadi
text: And declare thou unto them of Ibrahim's guests.

name: Daryabadi
text: When they entered unto him, and said; peace! He said: verily we are afraid of you.

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: be not afraid; verily we bear thou the glad tidings of a boy knowing.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: bear ye me glad tidings when old age hath touched me? of what then ye bear me glad tidings?

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: we bear tidings of a truth; be then thou not of the desponding.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: and who despondeth of the mercy of his Lord except the astray

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: what is your errand, sent ones?

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: verily we have been sent unto a people guilty-

name: Daryabadi
text: All except the household of Lut; surely we are going to deliver all of them.

name: Daryabadi
text: But not his wife; we have decreed that she will be of those staying behind.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then when the sent ones entered unto the household of Lut.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: verily ye are a people stranger.

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: nay! we have come to thee with that whereof they have been dubitating.

name: Daryabadi
text: And we have brought unto thee the truth, and verily we say sooth.

name: Daryabadi
text: So set out thou with thy house hold in a portion of the night, and follow thou their backs, and let not one of you look back, and pass whither ye are commanded.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We decreed unto him this commandment because the last of those was to be cut off in the early morning.

name: Daryabadi
text: And there came the people of the city rejoicing

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: verily these are my guests, so disgace me not.

name: Daryabadi
text: And fear Allah, and humiliate me not.

name: Daryabadi
text: They said: forbade we not thee against the worlds?

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: these are my daughters, if act ye must.

name: Daryabadi
text: By thy life, in their intoxication they were wandering bewildered.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then the shout took hold of them at the sunrise.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We made the upside there of downwards, and We rained on them stones of baked clay.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily therein are signs for men of sagacity.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily they are on a pathway lasting.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily in that is a sign for the believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And the dwellers of the wood surely were wrong-doers.

name: Daryabadi
text: So We took vengeance on them. And verily both are on a high-road open.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly the dwellers of Hijr belied the sent ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We brought Our signs unto them, yet they were averting themselves therefrom.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they were hewing out houses from mountains feeling secure.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then the shout took hold of them in the early morn.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then availed them not that which they had been earning.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We have not created the heaven and the earth and that which is in between them save with a purpose. And verily the Hour is surely coming; so overlook thou with a seemly overlooking,

name: Daryabadi
text: Verify thy Lord! He is the Great Creator, the Knower.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly We have vouchsafed unto thee seven of the repetitions and the mighty Qur'an.

name: Daryabadi
text: Cast not thine eyes toward that which We have let classes of them to enjoy; and grieve not over them, and lower thy wing unto the believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And say thou: verily I! I am a plain warner.

name: Daryabadi
text: Even as We sent down on the dividers -

name: Daryabadi
text: Those who have made the scripture bits.

name: Daryabadi
text: By thy Lord, We will question them all.

name: Daryabadi
text: For that which they have been working.

name: Daryabadi
text: Promulgate thou that which thou art commanded, and turn away from the associaters.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily We will suffice unto thee against the mockers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Who set up along with Allah anot her god; presently they shall know.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly We know that thou straitenest thy breast by that which they say.

name: Daryabadi
text: So hallow thou the praise of thy Lord, and be thou of the prostrate.

name: Daryabadi
text: And worship thy Lord until there cometh unto thee the certainty.
